body: You gain a new spell-like ability from the list of duergar racial traits.
name: Gray Dwarf Magic
url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Duergar/New Rules/Duergar Feats/Gray Dwarf Magic

sections.body: Choose one spell-like ability that is usable once per day and is granted by a duergar racial trait you don't have. You can use that spell-like ability once per day, with a caster level equal to your character level.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you must select a spell-like ability that's usable once per day from a different duergar racial trait.
sections.name: Special
